questionName: How can you kill the ostrich?

answers.text: Scare him on the concrete path.

questionName: Why do the brides wear white?

answers.text: Because white is standard color of home appliances.

questionName: How do you know you have free space only on right side of hard disk?

answers.text: There is an info  message: No space left on the device.

questionName: What is it called if you get the sauce and also its recipe in the restaurant?
What is the difference between teabag and Slavia (Czech football team)?

answers.text: The teabag stays longer in the cup.
They are both finishing your sentences.
